original_text: I tell that good news to other people, because God chose me to serve him in that way. That was God's gift to me, because he is so kind. God uses his great power to help me in that work.
korean_text: 이 복음을 위하여 그의 능력이 역사하시는 대로 내게 주신 하나님의 은혜의 선물을 따라 내가 일꾼이 되었노라

sentences.original_text: I tell that good news to other people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 다른 사람들에게 그 좋은 소식을 전합니다

sentences.original_text: because God chose me to serve him
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 나를 택하사 그를 섬기게 하셨기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: That was God's gift to me
to help me in that work
